title: Turning Red
plot: A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.
writers: Domee Shi, Julia Cho, Sarah Streicher
stars: Rosalie Chiang, Sandra Oh, Ava Morse
companies: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures

trailer.title: Turning Red
trailer.videoDescription: Mei Lee (voice of Rosalie Chiang) is a confident, dorky 13-year-old torn between staying her mother's dutiful daughter and the chaos of adolescence. Her protective, if not slightly overbearing mother, Ming (voice of Sandra Oh), is never far from her daughter - an unfortunate reality for the teenager. And as if changes to her interests, relationships and body weren't enough, whenever she gets too excited (which is practically ALWAYS), she "poofs" into a giant red panda!

title: RRR
plot: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920's.
writers: Vijayendra Prasad, Sai Madhav Burra, Madhan Karky
stars: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Ram Charan, Ajay Devgn

title: Don't Worry Darling
plot: A 1950s housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company may be hiding disturbing secrets.
writers: Katie Silberman, Carey Van Dyke, Shane Van Dyke
stars: Olivia Wilde, Florence Pugh, Chris Pine
companies: New Line Cinema, New Line Productions, Vertigo Entertainment

trailer.title: Don't Worry Darling
trailer.videoDescription: A 1950s housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company may be hiding disturbing secrets.

title: The Survivor
plot: After World War II, Harry Haft is a boxer who fought against his peers in concentration camps. Haunted by memories, he tries to use fighting legends as a way to find his love.
writers: Justine Juel Gillmer, Alan Scott Haft
stars: Ben Foster, Billy Magnussen, Vicky Krieps
companies: New Mandate Films, BRON Studios, Creative Wealth Media Finance

trailer.title: The Survivor
trailer.videoDescription:
Directed by Academy Award-winner Barry Levinson (Paterno, The Wizard of Lies, You Don't Know Jack) and based on a true story, HBO Original film The Survivor stars award-winning actor Ben Foster (Leave No Trace, Hell or High Water) as Harry Haft, who, after being sent to Auschwitz, survives not only the unspeakable horrors of the camp, but the gladiatorial boxing spectacle he is forced to perform with his fellow prisoners for the amusement of his captors. Unbeknownst to those who try to destroy him, Haft's will to survive is driven by his quest to reunite with the woman he loves.

The Survivor is an examination of one man's journey from unspeakable horrors to freedom, forgiveness and redemption.

title: Dune
plot: A mythic and emotionally charged hero's journey, "Dune" tells the story of Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, who must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.
writers: Jon Spaihts, Denis Villeneuve, Eric Roth

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
plot: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

trailer.title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
trailer.videoDescription: The blood-soaked land of Kolar Gold Fields (KGF) has a new overlord now - Rocky, whose name strikes fear in the heart of his foes. His allies look up to Rocky as their savior, the government sees him as a threat to law and order; enemies are clamoring for revenge and conspiring for his downfall. Bloodier battles and darker days await as Rocky continues on his quest for unchallenged supremacy.

keywords: mother son relationship,government,epic action,period drama,epic drama
